name: Mon Petit Atelier de Destruction du Patrimoine
name_original: Mon Petit Atelier de Destruction du Patrimoine
description:
Mon Petit Atelier de Destruction du Patrimoine, ("My Little Heritage Destruction Workshop"), or PADP for short, is a VR game where you get to visit a virtual museum. You can scan the objects with a tablet, to aquire knowledge about them, grab them to observe them more closely... and smash them.

This project explores the concept of sacredness and cultural heritage. What does it feel like to go against these rules we were taught our whole lives ?

This experience requires a VR headset ! It has been tested with HTC Vive and Vive Pro, but uses SteamVR, so it should also work with other devices.
